item.description:
Although I am not able to attend events for a while due to my crazy schedule, I wanted to add something to our calendar so other people can participate in our group. We have so many members and everyone is so friendly...I know it's not necessary for me to come in order for people to have fun!
This place has gotten some great reviews and I overheard some people last week raving about it. If you are not into sushi, never fear...they have hibatchi as well. The menu looks fantastic and prices seem reasonable for a Japanese restaurant. Is there someone who is willing to call the restaurant ahead of time to reserve a table?
I am using the new waiting list feature for this event so if it fills up, try to add yourself to the waiting list. Let me know how it works out!
item.how_to_find_us: Table should be under Ethnic Dining

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Kumo Sushi and Hibatchi Japanese Bar
